devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This contract is managed and deployed by a Project Registry contract, and must be initialized with a ReputationRegistry and TokenRegistry for full control.

clearProposerStake().details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction

clearReputationStake(address).details: Only callable by the Reputation Registry initialized during construction

clearStake().details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction, in the case of project failure

clearTokenStake(address).details: Only callable by the Token Registry initialized during construction

getTaskCount().details: Helper function used by the project library to get the length of the task array
getTaskCount().return: The number of tasks in the task array

returnWei(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flow

params._hyphaToken: The address of the systems token contract.
params._value: The amount of ether to send

setPassAmount(uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction

params._passAmount: The total weighting of all tasks which passed

setState(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry that was initialized during construction

params._nextDeadline: The nextDeadline to transition project to the next state
params._state: The state to update the project to

setTaskAddress(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction

params._index: Index of the task in the tasks array

setTaskLength(uint256).details: Only callable by the Project Registry initialized during construction

params._tasksLength: The amount of tasks as defined by the project stakers

setup(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Used for proxy deployment of this contract. Initialize a Project with a Reputation Registry and a Token Registry, and all related project values.

params._cost: The total cost of the project in wei
params._costProportion: The proportion of the project cost divided by theHyphaToken weiBal represented as integer
params._ipfsHash: The ipfs hash of the full project description
params._proposer: The address of the user proposing the project
params._proposerStake: The amount of reputation or tokens needed to create the proposal (5% of project cost)
params._proposerType: Denotes if a proposer is proposing a project with reputation or tokens, value must be 1: tokens or 2: reputation
params._stakingPeriod: The length of time the project is open for staking

stakeReputation(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Reputation Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flow

params._reputation: Amount of reputation to stake on the project
params._staker: Address of the staker who is staking

stakeTokens(address,uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the Token Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flow

params._staker: Address of the staker who is staking
params._tokens: Amount of tokens to stake on the project
params._weiValue: Amount of wei transferred to the project

transferWeiReward(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Reputation Registry or Token Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flow

params._reward: The amount of wei to transfer.
params._rewardee: The account who claimed and completed the task.

unstakeReputation(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the Reputation Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flowOnly callable before the staking period of a proposed project ends (state must still be 1)

params._reputation: Amount of reputation to unstake on the project
params._staker: Address of the staker who is unstaking

unstakeTokens(address,uint256,address).details: Only callable by the Token Registry initialized during construction, to maintain control flowOnly callable before the staking period of a proposed project ends (state must still be 1)

params._staker: Address of the staker who is unstaking
params._tokens: Amount of tokens to unstake on the project

unstakeTokens(address,uint256,address).return: The amount of ether to deduct from the projects balance

devdoc.title: An individual project in the distribute DAO system

clearProposerStake().notice: Clears the proposer stake on proposal expiration

clearReputationStake(address).notice: Clear the reputation stake of `_staker`, used during stake claiming

clearStake().notice: Clear the stake of all stakers in the event of Project failure

clearTokenStake(address).notice: Clear the token stake of `_staker`, used during stake claiming

getTaskCount().notice: The amount of tasks created in the project during the Staked period.

returnWei(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_value` wei back to distribute token balance on task failure

setPassAmount(uint256).notice: Set the weighting of the amount of tasks that passed to `_passAmount`

setState(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the project state to `_state`, and update the nextDeadline to `_nextDeadline`

setTaskAddress(address,uint256).notice: Set the address of a task at index `_index`

setTaskLength(uint256).notice: Set the number of project tasks to `_tasksLength` as defined by the project stakers

stakeTokens(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Stake `_tokens` tokens from `_staker` and add `_weiValue` to the project ether balance

transferWeiReward(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_reward` wei as reward for completing a task to `_rewardee

unstakeReputation(address,uint256).notice: Unstake `_reputation` reputation from the project, and update staked balance of `_staker`

unstakeTokens(address,uint256,address).notice: Unstake `_tokens` tokens from the project, subtract this value from the balance of `_staker` Returns the amount of ether to subtract from the project's ether balance

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to manage the state of all project related parameters while also maintaining a wei balance to be used in the case of reward. The project can be in 8 states, represented by integers. They are as follows: [1: Proposed, 2: Staked, 3: Active, 4: Validation, 5: Voting, 6: Complete, 7: Failed, 8: Expired]
